user_input: Modify the DHEM model.  o Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.  o Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.  o Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities  o Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step  o Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations based on the user's request to modify the DHEM model and associated Gas Pipeline Capacity data file.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model ...', select the most appropriate attribute representing the datafile from the available options.

function_args.user_input: set all values that aren't 0 to 999; copy H2\Gas data

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all non-zero values to 999 and copying the H2\Gas data.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, determine how the data file should be modified to reflect the new parameters.

tasks.description: Add a new scenario object named 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate context for adding a new scenario object.

tasks.description: Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class using the modified datafile and the new scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the properties within the specified categories to update with the max flow parameter.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995', add the new scenario, and rename the cloned model to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the model to clone and apply the new scenario accordingly.
